concept.description: Identify a jQAssistant plugin as component version containing files
concept.cypher: MATCH (artifact:Main:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(file:File) WHERE (artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(:File:Xml{fileName:"/META-INF/jqassistant-plugin.xml"}) MERGE (component:Dashboard:Component{id: artifact.group + ":" + artifact.name}) MERGE (component)-[:HAS_VERSION]->(version:Dashboard:Version{version:artifact.version}) MERGE (artifact)-[:PROVIDES]->(version) MERGE (version)-[:CONTAINS_FILE]->(file) SET file:Dashboard RETURN component as Component, version as Version, file as File ORDER BY component.id, component.version, file.fileName

MATCH (component:Dashboard:Component)-[:HAS_VERSION]->(version:Dashboard:Version)<-[:PROVIDES]-(artifact:Artifact), (artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(file:Java:Type:File)-[:EXTENDS|IMPLEMENTS*0..]->(interface:Interface)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->(label)-[:OF_TYPE]->(:Type{fqn:"com.buschmais.xo.neo4j.api.annotation.Label"}) OPTIONAL MATCH (label)-[:HAS]->(value:Value:Primitive{name:"value"}) WITH component, version, file, coalesce(value.value, interface.name) as labelValue MERGE (capability:Dashboard:Capability{type:"Label", value:labelValue}) MERGE (file)-[:PROVIDES_CAPABILITY]->(capability) RETURN component as Component, version as Version, file as File, capability as Capability ORDER BY component.id, version.version, capability.type, capability.value

MATCH (component:Dashboard:Component)-[:HAS_VERSION]->(version:Dashboard:Version)<-[:PROVIDES]-(artifact:Artifact), (artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(file:File:Xml)-[:HAS_ROOT_ELEMENT]->(root:Element{name:"jqassistant-rules"}), (root)-[:HAS_ELEMENT]->(rule:Xml:Element)-[:HAS_ATTRIBUTE]->(id:Xml:Attribute{name:"id"}) OPTIONAL MATCH (rule)-[:HAS_ELEMENT]->(:Xml:Element{name:"description"})-[:HAS_TEXT]->(description:Xml:Text) WITH component, version, file, case rule.name when "concept" then "Concept" when "constraint" then "Constraint" when "group" then "Group" else "unknown" end as capabilityType, id.value as ruleId, description MERGE (capability:Dashboard:Capability{type:capabilityType, value:ruleId}) MERGE (file)-[:PROVIDES_CAPABILITY]->(capability) SET capability.description=trim(description.value) RETURN component as Component, version as Version, file as File, capability as Capability ORDER BY component.id, version.version, capability.type, capability.value

MATCH (component:Dashboard:Component)-[:HAS_VERSION]->(version:Dashboard:Version)<-[:PROVIDES]-(artifact:Artifact), (artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(file:File:Xml)-[:HAS_ROOT_ELEMENT]->(root:Element{name:"jqassistant-rules"}), (root)-[:HAS_ELEMENT]->(rule:Xml:Element)-[:HAS_ELEMENT]->(requiresConcept:Xml:Element{name: "requiresConcept"}), (requiresConcept)-[:HAS_ATTRIBUTE]->(refId:Xml:Attribute{name:"refId"}) WHERE rule.name in ["concept", "constraint"] MERGE (capability:Dashboard:Capability{type:"Concept", value:refId.value}) MERGE (file)-[:REQUIRES_CAPABILITY]->(capability) RETURN component as Component, version as Version, file as File, capability as Capability ORDER BY component.id, version.version, capability.type, capability.value

MATCH (component:Dashboard:Component)-[:HAS_VERSION]->(version:Dashboard:Version)<-[:PROVIDES]-(artifact:Artifact), (artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(file:File:Xml)-[:HAS_ROOT_ELEMENT]->(root:Element{name:"jqassistant-rules"}), (root)-[:HAS_ELEMENT]->(rule:Xml:Element{name: "group"})-[:HAS_ELEMENT]->(include:Xml:Element), (include)-[:HAS_ATTRIBUTE]->(refId:Xml:Attribute{name:"refId"}) WITH component, version, file, case include.name when "includeConcept" then "Concept" when "includeConstraint" then "Constraint" when "includeGroup" then "Group" else "unknown" end as capabilityType, refId.value as ruleId MERGE (capability:Dashboard:Capability{type:capabilityType, value:ruleId}) MERGE (file)-[:REQUIRES_CAPABILITY]->(capability) RETURN component as Component, version as Version, file as File, capability as Capability ORDER BY component.id, version.version, capability.type, capability.value
